structure.unit: A PLANNING AND OVERSIGHT OF GOVERNMENTAL FINANCE

law.text: The officers and personnel of any state agency and any other person may serve at the request of the board upon any advisory committees that the board may create. State officers and personnel may serve upon these advisory committees without forfeiture of office or employment and with no loss or diminution in the compensation, status, rights, and privileges which they otherwise enjoy.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 503, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1990.
